info.title: Clinical Trials
info.description: ClinicalTrials.gov is a website and online database of clinical research studies and information about their results. The purpose of ClinicalTrials.gov is to provide information about clinical research studies to the public, researchers, and health care professionals. The U.S. government does not review or approve the safety and science of all studies listed on this website.

get.description: Returns data of studies matching query and filter parameters.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the response.

parameters.name: markupFormat
parameters.description: Format of markup type fields.

parameters.name: query.cond
parameters.description: Conditions or disease query in Essie expression syntax.

parameters.name: query.term
parameters.description: Other terms query in Essie expression syntax.

parameters.name: query.locn
parameters.description: Location terms query in Essie expression syntax.

parameters.name: query.titles
parameters.description: Title / acronym query in Essie expression syntax.

parameters.name: query.intr
parameters.description: Intervention / treatment query in Essie expression syntax.

parameters.name: query.outc
parameters.description: Outcome measure query in Essie expression syntax.

parameters.name: query.spons
parameters.description: Sponsor / collaborator query in Essie expression syntax.

parameters.name: query.lead
parameters.description: Searches in lead sponsor name field.

parameters.name: query.id
parameters.description: Study IDs query in Essie expression syntax.

parameters.name: query.patient
parameters.description: Patient query in Essie expression syntax.

parameters.name: filter.overallStatus
parameters.description: Filter by comma- or pipe-separated list of statuses.

parameters.name: filter.geo
parameters.description: Filter by geo-function. Format: distance(latitude,longitude,distance)

parameters.name: filter.ids
parameters.description: Filter by comma- or pipe-separated list of NCT IDs.

parameters.name: filter.advanced
parameters.description: Filter by query in Essie expression syntax.

parameters.name: filter.synonyms
parameters.description: Filter by comma- or pipe-separated list of area:synonym_id pairs.

parameters.name: postFilter.overallStatus
parameters.description: Filter by comma- or pipe-separated list of statuses.

parameters.name: postFilter.geo
parameters.description: Filter by geo-function. Format: distance(latitude,longitude,distance)

parameters.name: postFilter.ids
parameters.description: Filter by comma- or pipe-separated list of NCT IDs.

parameters.name: postFilter.advanced
parameters.description: Filter by query in Essie expression syntax](/find-studies/constructing-complex-search-queries)

parameters.name: postFilter.synonyms
parameters.description: Filter by comma- or pipe-separated list of area:synonym_id pairs.

parameters.name: aggFilters
parameters.description: Apply aggregation filters, aggregation counts will not be provided.

parameters.name: geoDecay
parameters.description: Set proximity factor by distance from filter.geo location to the closest LocationGeoPoint.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: If specified, must be non-empty comma- or pipe-separated list of fields to return. If unspecified, all fields will be returned.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Comma- or pipe-separated list of sorting options of the studies. The returning studies are not sorted by default for a performance reason.

parameters.name: countTotal
parameters.description: Count total number of studies in all pages and return totalCount field with first page, if true.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Page size is maximum number of studies to return in response. It does not have to be the same for every page.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: Token to get next page. Set it to a nextPageToken value returned with the previous page in JSON format.

get.description: Returns data of a single study.

parameters.name: nctId
parameters.description: NCT Number of a study.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the response.

parameters.name: markupFormat
parameters.description: Format of markup type fields.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: If specified, must be non-empty comma- or pipe-separated list of fields to return. If unspecified, all fields will be returned.

parameters.name: includeIndexedOnly
parameters.description: Include indexed-only fields, if true.

parameters.name: includeHistoricOnly
parameters.description: Include fields available only in historic data, if true.
